New-York Historical Society
Victor Fischer citizenship certificate
Fischer, Victor Adolph, 1877–1941.
AHMC – Fischer, Victor
2 item(s) in 1 folder.
1903 July 8 Certificate of United States citizenship issued to Czech immigrant Victor Fischer (1877–1941) by the Supreme Court of the State of New York, First Judicial District, on 8 July 1903. Accompanied by a billfold with printed advertisements, in Czech, for "Bohemia," akclová banka, a Prague bank. For further details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
